title: Experience the Luxury of Business Class Service at Avari Dubai HotelsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Experience the Luxury of Business Class Service at Avari Dubai Hotels Published on : Friday, September 25, 2015
Dubai an international business destination is well known. For the well healed and business traveller Avari Dubai Hotel a four star Hotel situated at Al Rigga introduces a service unique to suit a global business traveller.
This unique service starts as soon as you land at the airport, where a personalised picked up awaits you, an express check-in to a business class room or a suite is given, if your flight lands in the morning a special early 9.00 am check-in facilities your comfort. The well equipped and comfortable rooms that Avari Hotels are known for comes with all amenities of a four star hotel. An addition multimedia entertainment and high speed internet at no additional cost adds to the experience.
The “Avari Business Class Service” also entitles the traveller excess to the Club Lounge, where the business traveller can enjoy formal environment for meetings and relaxation, complimentary use of the well equipped business centre with photocopying and high speed internet assists the traveller in all his/ her business needs. Another uniqueness of this service is that the Avari Hotel help you will prime up your attire by giving a complementary ironing of a suite or laundry of a shirt. This really helps the business traveller prepare for that important meeting the visit demanded. Other facilities like unlimited soft beverages at the Club lounge or a well deserved massage at a discount in the Avari roof top Spa and swimming pool refreshes the business traveller.
